name: Syfovre

indications.text: syfovre indicated treatment geographic atrophy ( ga ) secondary age-related macular degeneration ( amd ) .

contraindications.text: recommended dose syfovre 15 mg ( 0.1 ml 150 mg/ml solution ) administered intravitreal injection affected eye every 25 60 days . ( 2.2 )

adverseReactions: ocular periocular infections ( 4.1 ) active intraocular inflammation ( 4.2 ) hypersensitivity ( 4.3 )
indications_original: SYFOVRE is indicated for the treatment of geographic atrophy (GA) secondary to age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
contraindications_original: The recommended dose for SYFOVRE is 15 mg (0.1 mL of 150 mg/mL solution) administered by intravitreal injection to each affected eye once every 25 to 60 days. ( 2.2 )
adverseReactions_original: Ocular or Periocular Infections ( 4.1 ) Active Intraocular Inflammation ( 4.2 ) Hypersensitivity ( 4.3 )
